entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 05:53 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: ENE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets at times mixed with snow changing to freezing rain or ice pellets near noon. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
